## ğŸ“‹ Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments
- [ ] I have updated TypeScript types/interfaces

### Database Changes (if applicable)

- [ ] I have created a migration script
- [ ] I have updated the database schema documentation
- [ ] I have tested the migration both up and down
- [ ] I have considered backward compatibility

### Security (if applicable)

- [ ] I have reviewed my changes for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not introduced any SQL injection risks
- [ ] I have not introduced any XSS vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have properly sanitized user inputs
- [ ] I have not exposed sensitive information in logs

### Performance (if applicable)

- [ ] I have considered the performance impact of my changes
- [ ] I have added appropriate database indexes
- [ ] I have tested with realistic data volumes
- [ ] I have not introduced memory leaks
